original_title: ラーメン大好き小泉さん2016新春SP
overview: Mysterious transfer student Mitsukuni Naruto (Ryo Narita) appears in front of Koizumi (Akari Hayami). Koizumi and Mitsukuni have different opinions about ramen which leads them into arguments. They decide to have a battle over who has a deeper love of ramen. --asianwiki
title: Ms. Koizumi Loves Ramen Noodles SP
